channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dune London Footwear
channel.desc: Starting on London's Oxford Street in 1992, Dune is an influential, dynamic and internationally-renowned footwear and accessories brand, with London heritage at the heart of what they do.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.
